text: Pteronotus is a genus of bats. Eight extant species have been recognized, as well as one relatively recently extinct species. ==References== * Gutierrez, E.E. & Molinari, J. 2008. Morphometrics and taxonomy of bats of the genus Pteronotus (subgenus Phyllodia) in Venezuela. Journal of Mammalogy 89(2): 292–305. Category:Bat genera Category:Taxa named by John Edward Gray
title: Pteronotus
